default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You... are the one who imprisoned us. I remember your scent... I'll spot you wherever you are.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Be honest, do you want me, or a beast?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Now that you've granted me power, don't let me loose againâ€”one moment will be too much.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Get ready. There will be blood.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Too soon, you scum, you gave up too soon!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Let me go. It's not over yet! Let go!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Ah!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Am I... finally free?

default.title: Greeting
default.text: I knew it was you. I recognize your footsteps.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: They wanted my arms, wanted my blood, wanted me to tear everything down. They wanted to create a monster, and I was the masterpiece.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: My blade has sliced many. Among them, Hella is not the strongest, but she's the toughest.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: In that blood-boiling moment, the body acts on instinct. Don't think, forget whoever you've torn apart.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Chains? They're nothing. I'm used to them. Also, I can get rid of them anytime I want.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I don't care how others call me. But I do like Ninety-Nine... It's the first name I've ever been given.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I don't remember much about Parma. Only Hella's voice in the dark. She kept talking to me, telling me about Syndicate, what's above the ground, people. She said she'd take me with her.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: You're the second person I've wanted to kill but couldn't. From now on, I'll keep on fighting for you, until the day I die.

default.title: Idle
default.text: ...I'm hungry.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: What... Do you want a fight?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Yeah, keep an eye on me, like how I'm watching you.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: I'll... do my best.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: It's done, as you've instructed.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Interesting.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Are you... trying to comfort me?

default.title: Deploy
default.text: I can feel my blood boiling.

chaotic_restraint.title: Obtain Attire
chaotic_restraint.text: I'm... Parma's living weapon, Ninety-Nine. Fight... Give me orders, I only need to fight...

chaotic_restraint.title: Level Up
chaotic_restraint.text: I'm stronger now... I'll give them a quick death.

chaotic_restraint.title: Greeting
chaotic_restraint.text: You're here... When does the next fight start?

chaotic_restraint.title: Ordinary Contact 1
chaotic_restraint.text: Fight, fight endlessly, until one side falls...

chaotic_restraint.title: Ordinary Contact 2
chaotic_restraint.text: Pain distracts you, so if you want to survive, you must get used to pain.

chaotic_restraint.title: Idle
chaotic_restraint.text: You seem to be here all the time. What's your purpose?

chaotic_restraint.title: Special Attention
chaotic_restraint.text: If it's not for a fight, what are you here for? Am I useful in other ways?
